# Shredding and Disposal Services
## Request for Proposal (RFP)
### Description
The Courts Administration Service (CAS) is soliciting proposals from qualified contractors to provide shredding and disposal services for the secure destruction of sensitive documents.

### Requirements
* Provide a monthly recurring purge of a minimum of 96 (1.2 cu ft) banker boxes
* Offer additional shredding service(s) for bulk pick-ups
* Request prices for banker boxes of 2.4 and 3.6 cu ft for future requirements
* Meet security requirements for document destruction

### Terms
* The contract will be for one (1) year with an option to extend for up to three (3) additional one (1) year terms
* Tendering Procedure: Competitive
* The RFP documents are available on the [Canada Buys](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/) website

### Response Requirements
Proposals should be submitted to [marco.pelchat@cas-satj.gc.ca](mailto:marco.pelchat@cas-satj.gc.ca) by the deadline of December 9, 2024 at 14:00 EST.

### Evaluation Criteria
Proposals will be evaluated based on price, ability to meet the requirements, and other relevant factors.

### Trade Agreements
This solicitation is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

### Contact Information
For more information, please contact Marco Pelchat at [marco.pelchat@cas-satj.gc.ca](mailto:marco.pelchat@cas-satj.gc.ca) or (613) 315-7390.
